---

## SDQ vs TEPS

Harmony, a breakthrough software for psychologists, has become an indispensable tool in survey harmonisation, specifically when comparing psychological questionnaires like SDQ (Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire) and TEPS (Temporal Experience of Pleasure Scale). Putting the term 'SDQ vs TEPS' into perspective, Harmony uses generative AI and natural language processing to streamline the comparison and harmonisation process, thereby saving psychologists untold hours of tedious and subjective manual work.
 
## Using Harmony in SDQ vs TEPS Analysis
 
In the analysis of SDQ vs TEPS, Harmony is incredibly useful. While SDQ is centered on assessing behavioural patterns in children, TEPS, on the other hand, is designed to measure the subject's anticipation and experience of pleasure. By introducing these questionnaires into Harmony's web interface, the software uses advanced language models to give a percentage of match between each item in SDQ and TEPS. This raises the efficiency and accuracy of comparing SDQ vs TEPS, providing researchers reliable data to utilize in their studies.

## Multilingual Features in Harmonisation

Perhaps one of the most groundbreaking features of Harmony is its multilingual functionality. This feature adds immense value to the 'SDQ vs TEPS' discussion because it enables the software to compare items not just in the original language, but across different languages. Thus, serving as a robust tool for social researchers and psychologists conducting multinational studies and seeking to make valid comparisons without the typical hassle. Truly, the pairing of SDQ vs TEPS, executed through Harmony, paves the path for contemporary and efficient research methods.

## Compare the items in SDQ and TEPS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import SDQ and TEPS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SDQ into Harmony</a> - compare SDQ with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just TEPS into Harmony</a> - compare TEPS with other instruments
